attributes.action: Provide free biodiesel and LPG conversions for people with older cars and low incomes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide free biodiesel and LPG conversions for people with older cars and low incomes. Many people who recognise that their drining is damaging to the environment simply cannot afford to do anything about it. Prices for the new Toyota Prius START from £17,777. If the government took this first step then many people would follow them.
